templates.title: SELECT
templates.body: SELECT * FROM public."active_app_report" LIMIT 10;

templates.title: INSERT
templates.body:
INSERT INTO public."active_app_report" ("active_app", "num_api_calls", "date", "report_type", "app_id")
  VALUES ('', 1, '', '', '');

templates.title: UPDATE
templates.body:
UPDATE public."active_app_report" SET
    "active_app" = ''
    "num_api_calls" = 1
    "date" = ''
    "report_type" = ''
    "app_id" = ''
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!

templates.title: DELETE
templates.body:
DELETE FROM public."active_app_report"
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may delete everything in the table!

templates.body:

    "orgId" = ''
    "actionName" = ''
